main event: A civilian observed a bright light moving in the sky for approximately 15 seconds, believed to be a possible meteor.
interesting points: The observer described the object as appearing circular or elliptical in shape and very bright., The sighting lasted for 15 seconds before the object disappeared suddenly., The observer attempted to contact neighbors to verify the sighting., The object was at an approximate altitude of 1,000 feet., The observer is a 43-year-old male mechanical engineer trained as a combat observer and bomber pilot.
witness description: 43-year-old male mechanical engineer, US Navy, trained as a combat observer & bomber pilot
